Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Eyelash \Eye"lash`\, n. 1. The fringe of hair that edges the eyelid; -- usually in the pl. [1913 Webster]
2. A hair of the fringe on the edge of the eyelid. [1913 Webster]
eyelash n : any of the short curved hairs that grow from the edges of the eyelids [syn: {lash}, {cilium}]
